EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.3 - Director/C-Level - Microsite and Contact Us
EmailTemplate.subject: We thought you might like...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With so much information available to you, it can be hard to find relevant technology content for your business. We put a handful of content we thought you might be interested in on this microsite <[[https://content.pivotal.io/content-executives?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-3&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>. Feel free to peruse at your leisure! If you have any questions, feel free to give us a ping <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-3&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
